medium: Black and white chalk on gray paper
title: Head of Meleager (recto); Unfinished Study of the Farnese Hercules from the Back (verso)
description: recto:  sculpted male head with wavy hair in chunky pieces; wide bridge of nose; head turned slightly to PL; verso:  standing nude male figure seen from back, with head bent down; heels together, with PR foot slightly in front, toes apart; PR hand on back of hip bone; some geometric perspective sketches, LRC
